snippet: Two French aid workers, Eric Breteau and Emilie Lelouch, were sentenced to 2 years in prison for trying to bring 103 children from Africa to France for adoption.
abstract: French aid workers Eric Breteau and Emilie Lelouch are sentenced to 2 years in prison for trying to bring 103 children from Chad to France for adoption.
lead_paragraph: Two French aid workers, Eric Breteau and Emilie Lelouch, were sentenced to 2 years in prison for trying to bring 103 children from Africa to France for adoption.

headline.main: France: Aid Workers Convicted in Adoption Scheme
headline.print_headline: France: Aid Workers Convicted in Adoption Scheme
